iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 52 FF D0 5E 5D C3 }  // ExitProcess call with surrounding stack manipulation
        $pattern1 = { CE 59 DD 99 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // INTO instruction with memory address offset
        $pattern2 = { DD 99 ?? ?? ?? ?? EF 8B 45 ?? }  // FSTP + OUT instruction with memory offset

    condition:
        any of them
}
